bio: Moroccan tactician who led Jordan to their first-ever FIFA World Cup qualification in 2025, securing their place with a commanding 3-0 victory over Oman. A former Morocco international who played at the 1998 World Cup, Sellami built his coaching reputation by winning the 2018 African Nations Championship with Morocco's local-based squad and the Moroccan league title with Raja Casablanca in 2020. Known for disciplined, composed game management and smart tactical adjustments throughout qualifying campaigns.
